attributes.action: Place down immense actions towards school bullies before suicide becomes reality
attributes.additional_details: Horrific bullying isn't something that can be prevented with ease or able to shrug off as it leaves a life time of first class torture. Wether it's emotionally or physically, both condemn the same feelings, attitude and body language. We as Britain should be proud of our hard working country, but how can we let it slip and go unnotice? We may not be able to abolish the demonic actions in others, but we can prevent it. Stand with me, stand with the victims, and stand against bullying!
attributes.background: Bullying, harassment and suicide is on the rise, but more so around schools. Negativity shouldn't exist in a place of education as schooling is here to improve and help the students.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do to tackle bullying.
